New Records: Manny Machado tied the Padres' career home run record with his 25th home run of the season, reaching 163 career homers with the team
Post-Match Reflections: The Padres gained ground in the National League playoff race with the win
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game included a defensive gaffe by the Giants, leading to two unearned runs
Mason Black struggled on the mound for the Giants
Matt Chapman and Grant McCray each had two hits for the Giants
Manny Machado's performance helped the Padres secure the win
